text: Syrian protests may refer to: * 1936 Syrian general strike * 1964 Hama riot * 1999 Latakia protests * 2004 Al-Qamishli riots * Civil uprising phase of the Syrian Civil War (2011) * Syrian protests (2016) * 2020 Suweida protests in the southern Syrian city of Suweida ==See also== *History of Syria
title: Syrian protests
